draft.title: F.VO Ordering Dashboard v2
draft.description: CRM-style dashboard for managing Follow-up VO (Verordnung) ordering workflow. Track prescription orders through different stages from initial order to completion with drag-and-drop functionality.

draft.title: F.VO Ordering Dashboard v3
draft.description: CRM-style dashboard for managing Follow-up VO (Verordnung) ordering workflow. Track prescription orders through different stages from initial order to completion with drag-and-drop functionality.

draft.title: Per Therapist Breakdown of Completed VOs
draft.description: Dashboard showing breakdown of completed VOs per therapist to help operations team identify which therapists have VOs ready for pickup and billing. Displays therapist name, ER assignments, and count of Fertig VOs.

draft.title: VO Validation
draft.description: Comprehensive validation dashboard for managing healthcare prescription orders and validation status. Filter by VO Status, Einrichtung (facility), and Therapeut with full table view of all validation-related data including treatment progress, dates, status tracking, and VO slip management.

draft.title: VO Validation + Billing
draft.description: Comprehensive validation and billing dashboard for managing healthcare prescription orders. Complete validation checks, manage treatment history, upload VO slips, and process billing information all in one integrated workflow.

draft.title: Activity to Treatment
draft.description: Therapist calendar with workflow to convert activity cards into treatment cards by selecting from assigned VOs. Features weekly calendar view, activity management, and seamless conversion from generic activities (Pause, Doku, Other) to patient-specific treatments.

draft.title: VO Upload
draft.description: Prescription upload and review system. Therapists can upload prescription images with optional VO numbers. Admins review uploads, set status (Pending Review, Low Picture Quality, Missing VO Number, Uploaded to TO, Other), and add notes. Includes filtering by status and search functionality.

draft.title: Copayment Upload
draft.description: Simplified copayment slip upload and review system. Therapists can upload copayment slip images. Admins review uploads and set status (Pending Review, Low Picture Quality, Confirmed). Streamlined workflow with filtering by status and search functionality.

draft.title: Practice Follow-up CRM
draft.description: CRM system for tracking follow-up verification orders (FVOs) from doctor practices. Priority queue interface automatically triages practices by urgency (Overdue, Due Today, This Week). Split-screen layout with practice cards and detailed follow-up information for efficient calling workflows.

draft.title: Patient View + Notification Center (Alternative)
draft.description: Alternative design for patient-centric view with notification center. Features different layout approach for therapists to manage VOs and receive notifications. Same functionality as main version with experimental UI patterns.

draft.title: Other Documents Upload
draft.description: Document upload and review system for various document types (Zuzahlungsbefreiung, Patienteninformationsbogen, Honorarvereinbarung, Andere). Therapists select document type before uploading. Features German 12-hour date format and document type filtering.

draft.title: VO Creation & Editing
draft.description: Complete prototype for creating and editing Verordnungen (prescriptions). Features a production-style dashboard with filtering, pagination, and tabbed views. Create VOs with linked therapists, patients, and doctors. Supports inline entity creation, Heilmittel catalog search, and Folge-VO linking.

draft.title: Heilmittel Management
draft.description: Admin prototype for managing Heilmittel (treatment) codes and tariffs. Features CRUD operations, historical price tracking for all 4 tariffs with effective dates, and filtering by Bereich, Kind, and BV status.
